title: Mozilla Thunderbird Mailing system
content:
Hi,

Does anybody know whether there's a way to add a digital signature from within Thunderbird. Thanks to share.

Kind regards, Hervé
creator: jhcabon

title: Bład odbierania wiadomości
content:
Witam Mam pewien problem Niekiedy - ostatnio dosyć często, nie mogę pobrać wiadomości z serwera. Serwer to pop3.onet.pl Wyskakuje mi błąd jak w załączniku nr. 1 Wejście na serwer pocztowy i usunięcie wiadomości która zawiera dziwna ikonkę tak jak to obuwie.pl powoduje, że pocztę nadal mogę ściągnąć na dysk. Aż do kolejnej podobnej wiadomości załącznik nr.3. Nigdy nie miałem takich problemów tylko coś ostatnio się pokopało. Pod spodem wklejam moje ustawienia z Thunderbirda

title: Thunderbird příloha
content: V příchozí poště mám od jistého korespondenta e-mailovou zprávu, která obsahuje přílohy, které po stažení do PC v ThB nejdou samostatně smazat - po kliknutí pravým tlačítkem myši na přílohu jsou možnosti Vyčlenit a Smazat nefunkční. Lze smazat pouze celou zprávu, což nechci. Přílohy v e-mailech od jiných korespondentů jdou smazat bez problému.

title: Thunderbird non sembra riesca a connettersi al server Imap

È possibile riprovare o salvare localmente il messaggio su Cartelle locali/Posta inviata-XXXXX@XXX.it Non riesco nemmeno a ricevere i nuovi messaggi. La web mail funziona correttamente. 102.9.1 (64 bit) monterey 12.6.3

title: Impossibilita' ad importare i profili da un'altro computer.
content:
Buongiorno;

Sto cercando di installare thunderbird su un computer in cui ho reinstallato il SO winsows 10; ho seguito le istruzioni su questo video in inglese :

https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/trasferire-dati-thunderbird-nuovo-computer

su come importare i profili ma purtroppo thunderbird, una volta importati mi ritorna questa risposta di cui allego screenshoot. Da dire che al momento ho reinstallato windows 10, ma i profili da importare vengono da una installazione di windows 11 se puo' servire. Dopodiche' non riesco piu' ad andare avanti; potreste aiutarmi per favore ? Saluti, Roberto

title: Calendar Time not getting updated
content: TB version 102.9.0 the time on the calendar was NOT in sync with the time on the computer. It was an hour behind. I see there is a new update 102.9.1. Let me try that for a while and see how it does. I like to see calendar notifications prior to the event. Something colorful that stands out at ya.
creator: OkieUnix

title: Unable to select cert from ECA device
content:
I am trying to sign/encrypt email using Thunderbird 102.9.0 on RHEL 8.7 with a USB IdenTrust ECA. I am able to use the same ECA on Windows with Outlook and the ActivClient middleware.

In the "S/MIME Security Devices" window I have a security device "p11-kit-proxy" which shows my ECA as "ActivIdentity Activkey_Sim [CCID Bulk Interface] 00 00". I am able to "Log In" to the device.

Under "Manage S/MIME Certificates" I am able to view the two certificates from the ECA. Both have my correct email address under "Subject Alt Names". One has "Key Usages" listed as Key Encipherment and E-mail Protection. The other lists Digital Signature, Non-Repudiation, Client Authentication, E-mail Protection, Smartcard Login.

The problem occurs when I try to Select the S/MIME Personal certificate for digital signing or encryption. When I click either of those buttons I get the following error: "Certificate Manager can't locate a valid certificate that can be used to digitally sign your messages with an address of <my email address>."

It seems like the ECA certs should be available to select since Thunderbird can log into the device and view them. I've run out of ideas on how to troubleshoot this.
creator: justin74

title: can't edit an address book entry
content:
I have Thunderbird 102.9.0. I can't edit an address book entry. I am trying to add another email address for a particular entry. Save does not work, it does not save the edit. If you can't provide a fix, how do I go back to a previous version just within Firefox?

I hate it when updates break things. And now it wants to do another update. Your updates are too frequent. You need to vet them better before releasing.
creator: troubleshooterF108

title: Menu toolbar in reading pane obscured (top half)
content: In the reading pane, with the latest update, the toolbar buttons appear with the top half cut off. If I close down and restart the program, the buttons appear fully. But after a while, the cut-off top problem recurs.
creator: relativevalue1

title: Account creation won't finish
content:
Hello,

I'm trying to set up an iCloud Mail account in Thunderbird, and the account setup won't finish. I've filled in all the information, and clicked Done, and it comes back with "Password OK"... but then nothing happens. The account doesn't appear on the Inbox screen, and the Account Setup screen stays exactly where it is, except with the "Done" button disabled. The only apparent options I have are "Cancel" and close the tab, which have both resulted in the setup being cancelled.

What's happening, and what can I do to push this towards a proper conclusion?
creator: awestrikernova

title: ESMTP error Temporarily not available
content: ESMTP error has been temporarily unavailable for a few days. I have been asked for a password and used my comcast password. Is there something I should be doing? I receive emails through Thunderbird but cannot send or forward. Everything works from my iphone and the xfinity website.
creator: bertcher

title: Can't use old Profile in new installation
content:
I just reinstalled Windows and Thunderbird, and am trying to use my previous profile and files. My files were previously stored in c:\Thunderbird, rather than the default location.

With TB closed, I opened the Profile Manager, clicked Create Profile, changed the location to c:\Thunderbird, and then click Create Profile. I left it set as the default profile.

However, when I open Thunderbird, I'm at the startup screen, where it's asking me to enter my email address. None of my files are visible.

I then deleted the profile (but left the files intact), and used the default profile. When I entered Thunderbird, I clicked Import, then Import from another Thunderbird installation, then Choose a profile folder, and then I selected c:\Thunderbird. I left all boxes under "What to import" checked, and clicked Continue and then Start Import.

Got a message: "Import failed unexpectedly, more infomration may be available in the error console."

I then tried it again, leaving only "Accounts and settings" checked. Same message.

Going into the error console, the message is this: "Uncaught (in promise) DOMException: Could not open the file at C:\Thunderbird\prefs.js".

I then went into C:\Users\{username}\AppData\Roaming\ and deleted the Thunderbird folder and tried the import again, as well as the creating of the profile again. Same results.

Any ideas about what I could do?

Thanks!
creator: Enargins

title: Yahoo messages won't download to Thunderbird.
content:
Over the last 10 days, Yahoo messages won't download to thunderbird; the problem goes away for a while but then recurs. this time it has been over 24 hours. I can send messages from Thunderbird, and can see messages on my webmail and mail app.. I'm using an iMac with OS 10.12.6

thanks for any answers. Dominie Nash

title: Email rejeitado pelo thunderbird como junk mail - lista btanca
content: estou redirecionado automaticamente emails do zoho (alex. waisberg@exxacta.net.br) para um email thunderbird (alex.wausberg@exxacta.com.br) , estava funcionando normalmente mas gora o thunderbird esta rejeitando como junk mail , nem para o spam esta indo , tenho como colocar o exxacta.net.br numa lista branca de email validos no thuderbird ?
creator: alex.waisberg

title: Contas configuradas mas e-mails sumiram
content:
Usei o Thunderbird para fazer backup de uma conta do Google que não teria mais acesso. Configurei conta por conta e baixei todos e-mails, uma a uma.

Estava tudo funcionando e do nada as pastas ficaram sem aparecer, nem consigo acessar os e-mails.

Enviei 2 imagens aqui. A primeira mostra como aparece na tela principal (nessa eles estão ali mas não abrem) e a segunda mostra a tela Configurações de conta (todas as contas de e-mail).

OBS: como não tenho mais o acesso a todos e-mails do gmail, nas configurações eu tirei o servidor IMAP pra não ficar dando erro.

OBS: sei que todos e-mails foram baixados porque a pasta PROFILE tem 25GB de arquivos.

E mais, instalei em outro computador e copiei os arquivos para lá...mas ao abrir fica do mesmo jeito, com essas contas 'em branco'.
creator: inrapa

title: Cannot send mail to hotmail.com account.
content:
Just wanted to put this out there in case others had the problem:

After deleting then re-installing Thunderbird on my windows 10 PC last week I was able to receive but not send messages.

I spent hours pulling my hair out, trying various solutions that I found posted online but none solved my problem.

It was ultimately solved by deleting then re-installing the authenticator application on my iphone then manually configuring my account authentication to OAuth2.

Unsure why, but initially setting the OAuth2 authentication didn't work. Deleting then re-installing the authenticator app on my iphone is what fixed this!

Computers Aaargh!!!
creator: bethellan

title: My TB (102.9.1, Win64) has no Tools/Options menu
content:
I've read all the solutions to Thunderbird not remembering passwords and all of them require accessing the Options menu. Problem is that it doesn't exist on my installation and there is no "options" under the MENU button either. See screenshot. If I go to MENU/Settings and then click on "Saved Passwords" it shows a blank form, even though I've logged into and attempted to save the password many times. See SavedLogins.jpg.

Here's the history of this installation under Windows 10, 64 bit. For a decade I was using Eudora then Eudora OSE, which was really a version of Thunderbird. About 4 years ago, I converted it to Thunderbird. Password saving worked fine but TB couldn't read web pages in messages.

About a year ago, I made a new installation of TB which fixed the web access problem, but password saving didn't work and that's the state I'm in now.

My email provider is Earthlink. The Message Storage local directory for the 3 accounts are at D:\Eudora(Thunderbird)Mail\Mail\pop.earthlink.net D:\Eudora(Thunderbird)Mail\Mail\pop.earthlink-2.net D:\Eudora(Thunderbird)Mail\Mail\pop.earthlink-3.net

Something in Thunderbird is pointing at the wrong location for stored passwords, because when I tell TB to save the password, it puts it in WRITE ONLY MEMORY! Please help!
creator: jpetzing

title: Thunderbird thinks it has an invalid filter to a folder that does not exist.
content: The folder 'Junk-1 on ***@***.com' could not be found, so filter(s) associated with this folder will be disabled. Verify that the folder exists, and that filters point to a valid destination folder. Thunderbird thinks it has an invalid filter to a folder that does not exist. No, I do not have a folder "Junk-1" No, I do not have a filter that references "Junk-1" No, the file "msgFilterRules.dat" for this account does not have a reference to "Junk-1" Yes, this happens EVERY, SINGLE, TIME, Thunderbird is opened. Yes, this happens with 102.9.1 (32-bit) as it has for the last couple of years. Suggestion, since Thunderbird can not show the filter that does not exist, maybe it could DELETE the filter from where ever it a hallucinating it and move on.
creator: mozilla414

title: Messages aren't sorted properly
content: I want to have my messages sorted according to date. As you can see in the attached screendump I am not successful in this undertaking. How do I get a proper sorting by date? Thanks in advance for any tip H Thunderbird 102.9.0 (64-bitar) on Ubuntu 22.04
creator: hakelm
